articles.title: An accounting startup has turned tax preparations into a Pokémon Showdown game - TechCrunch
articles.description: Accounting software company Open Ledger has launched a new product in time for tax day.  Meet PokéTax, a game that helps make tax filing quite fun.

Accounting software company Open Ledger has launched a new product in time for tax day.
